reviews.text: I have lunched at the Toft twice this week. I organised the first for a large group of over 30 retirees. The Suite was laid out with round tables rather than long ones which were appreciated as it enabled members to converse with people not well known to them. The ambiance, food and service were excellent and enjoyed by all. The entrance of the flaming Christmas puddings was a nice touch.
reviews.title: Very Enjoyable Visits

reviews.text: Two days later I was back for a smaller gathering of just under 20 people. This time we were in a slightly crowded room in the main hotel seated at one large table. Again the food was enjoyed with the turkey carved individually and the puddings flambed.
reviews.title: Excellant all round
Great staff, but menu needs slimming down to improve quality
reviews.text: Second week on trot for Sunday lunch here with family members.Excellant food once again,can't wait till the next time.
On a sunny evening the outside dining area at this golf club restaurant is very attractive and is leagues away from the more dated interior.
reviews.title: This place beautifully caters for business or pleasure.

reviews.text: Inside the bubbly and efficient staff are a delight and are to be congratulated on their levels of friendly service.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
Surprising!
reviews.text: Food was very good, for a hotel 'in the middle of nowhere' with no competition - well done to the chef.
